body: Came here because i noticed that my bookmark for つづきから (p.029) was gone (seems like the standalone chap got yeeted here at nh) but damnnn the last one was really cute and wholesome

Mr. Former President: You're a hentai life-saver. I have a bunch that I still haven't archived yet and so I would love to get them and seed as well so more ppl can be shared among us degen fellas. Thank you so much and have a good day, Sir! o7
@MeruBite If you are talking about the zip sites, yes, they handle normal manga as well.

Edited to add more details. Might post more later. This is not my preferred solution but you guys might want to consider using DDL sites like cmczip and dlraw, if you want the raw magazines. The kairakuten files there seem to be intact, for example. It's just that they link to zip file hosters who normally place a limit on you in terms of speed and number of files you can download. Sucks, but better than nothing. Just tested kairakuten torrents on nyaa too and they are still working. Can't believe I'm saying this shit about hentai but don't lose hope.
